title: Why Does the Richest Country in the World Have So Many Poor Kids? (Ep. 475 Update)
description: Among O.E.C.D. nations, the U.S. has one of the highest rates of child poverty. Until recently, it looked as if Washington was about to change that. But then … Washington happened.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
